name: EUROPEAN HOTEL FORUM
memberOrga:
AccorHotels, Best Western, Carlson Rezidor, Choice, CitizenM, Hilton Worldwide, Hyatt, IHG, Marriott, Nordic Choice, Sarova Hotels UK, Whitbread / Premier Inn UK
Wyndham
goal: The European Hotel Forum is founded as a pan-European forum to research hospitality-related issues and take action on them as appropriate through legislative, policy, media and hotel industry educational venues.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
- Tourism policy
- Competition policy
- Consumer protection
- Single Market
- Digital Single Market
